RelatedSentence: Saudi health authorities reported yesterday new deaths from the Mers coronavirus , taking to 173 the overall number of fatalities from the disease in the world 's worst - hit country .
Saudi health authorities reported yesterday new deaths from the Mers coronavirus , taking to 173 the overall number of fatalities from the disease in the world 's worst - hit country .
The health ministry said on its website that five people have died , including a 28 - year - old woman in the port city of Jeddah , and a 32 - year - old man in northern Tabuk .
A woman aged 69 died in Riyadh and a 55 - year - old man died in Makkah , which is visited by millions of pilgrims each year .
The ministry said the total numbers of infections has reached 537 .
